body.p: The ZLive animator is part of the CZT project that aims at providing a framework for building formal methods tools, especially for the Z specification language. This subproject provides an animator for evaluating Z expressions, predicates and schemas. It can be used to execute some schemas, to test that given values satisfy a schema, or to generate all solutions of a set or schema.

ZLive provides a simple textual user interface that handles Z in LaTeX markup. A graphical user interface is planned for Unicode markup, with menus to enter common Z symbols. Also, ZLive will become the evaluation engine behind the Gaffe user interface builder. This will allow customised graphical interfaces to be built for the animation of a given Z specification.
